page.title: 09A typical house in Bloxwich
page.content: I live on the Mossley housing estate, about one mile north of Bloxwich High Street.There are various types of houses,including bungalows,detached, semi-detached and town houses,but most live in town houses in rows of 6 or 8. Our town house has 2 rooms downstairs. In the kitchen there is a gas cooker, a gas fire,cupboard,fridge freezer, automatic washing machine,tumble drier and sink unit.In the living room is a colour TV,record player,wall unit gas fire and corner suite.There are 3 bedrooms,mine has a single bed,record player,bookcase,dressing table with a portable TV and a typewriter.The wall is covered with posters of Elvis Presley.My 4 brothers share the largest room,sleeping in bunk beds either side of the window.My parents have the other room.We have a separate toilet and bathroom.
